mapper.update:
update change_detail
wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance_source = #{balanceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transaction_type = #{transactionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transaction_time = #{transactionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update change_detail set wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance_source = #{balanceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transaction_type = #{transactionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transaction_time = #{transactionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO change_detail ( wechat_id, money, balance, balance_source, transaction_type, transaction_time, remark, order_id ) VALUES
( #{item.wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.balanceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transactionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.transactionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE wechat_id = VALUES(wechat_id), money= VALUES(money), balance= VALUES(balance), balance_source= VALUES(balance_source), transaction_type= VALUES(transaction_type), transaction_time= VALUES(transaction_time), remark= VALUES(remark), order_id= VALUES(order_id)
mapper.select:
select
from change_detail where wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id asc LIMIT 0,200
